comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
Part of the story of this commemoration of Lincoln's Birthday is carried on page 1 of the following day's New York Times:

"President Honors Lincoln; Cities Hear Leaders of GOP; PRESIDENT ATTENDS LINCOLN CEREMONY

    

Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES. ();
February 13, 1947,
, Section , Page 1, Column , words

[ DISPLAYING ABSTRACT ]

WASHINGTON, Feb. 12--In a brief ceremony, President Truman visited the Lincoln Memorial here today and watched Maj. Gen. Harry H. Vaughan, his military aide, carry his wreath of white flowers up the long steps to the foot of the statue and deposit it among the many tributes that were left there all day long."

------------
